user.description: Configure the IPCom integration by providing the CLI script path and connection details.

data.cli_path: Path to ipcom_cli.py (absolute or relative to config directory)

error.cli_not_found: CLI script not found at the specified path. Please check the path and try again.

error.connection_timeout: Connection to IPCom timed out. Please check the host and port.
error.cli_failed: CLI command failed. Check that the CLI script works and IPCom is accessible.

error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Check the logs for details.
